description:
When Odaiba Cop’s Detective Kudoh dies on duties, Sayo’s not the only one crying.  Matsuda, who plays the role of Detective Kudo, can’t seem to find another gig and winds up back in Shibuya where he used to hang out when he was younger...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Junshoku Shikushiku: Odaiba Shark Saigo no Hi!
Killed in the Line of Duty! Weeping! Odaiba Shark`s Final Day!
殉職♥シクシク→お台場シャーク最後の日!
